examples.example: 当我们学会放下过去的烦恼，就能更好地拥抱未来的美好。

translate.english: When we learn to let go of the past troubles, we can better embrace the beauty of the future.

examples.example: 他终于放下了心中的执念，开始享受当下的生活。

translate.english: He finally let go of the obsession in his heart and began to enjoy the current life.

examples.example: 当我们放下心中的负担，便能轻装上阵，迎接生活的挑战。

translate.english: When we lay down the burden in our hearts, we can go into battle lightly and meet the challenges of life.
